enWisdom: Prepare yourselves for death for indeed it overshadows you

Wisdom: أَسْمِعُوا دَعْوَةَ الْمَوْتِ آذَانَكُمْ قَبْلَ أَنْ يُدْعَى بِكُمْ
enWisdom: Let your ears hear the call of death before it calls you

Wisdom: احْذَرِ الْمَوْتَ وَأَحْسِنْ لَهُ الِاسْتِعْدَادَ تَسْعَدْ بِمُنْقَلَبِكَ
enWisdom: Beware of death and be adequately prepared for it, [for by this] you will be happy in your place of [final] return

Wisdom: إِيَّاكَ أَنْ يَنْزِلَ بِكَ الْمَوْتُ وَأَنْتَ آبِقٌ عَنْ رَبِّكَ فِي طَلَبِ الدُّنْيَا
enWisdom: Be careful that death does not descend upon you while you are a fugitive [who has run away] from Allah in your seeking [the pleasures of] this world

Wisdom: إِنَّ أَمْراً لَا تَعْلَمُ مَتَى يَفْجَؤُكَ يَنْبَغِي أَنْ تَسْتَعِدَّ لَهُ قَبْلَ أَنْ يَغْشَاكَ
enWisdom: Verily it behoves you to prepare for the matter about the timing of whose sudden occurrence you have no knowledge of before it overcomes you

Wisdom: إِنَّ لَكُمْ نِهَايَةً فَانْتَهُوا إِلَى نِهَايَتِكُمْ وَإِنَّ لَكُمْ عَلَماً فَانْتَهُوا بِعَلَمِكُمْ
enWisdom: Verily you have an ultimate destination so move towards your destination, and you have a guide so move towards it with [the help of] your guide

Wisdom: إِنَّ الْمَرْءَ إِذَا هَلَكَ قَالَ النَّاسُ مَا تَرَكَ وَقَالَتِ الْمَلَائِكَةُ مَا قَدَّمَ لِلَّهِ آبَاؤُكُمْ فَقَدِّمُوا بَعْضاً يَكُنْ لَكُمْ ذُخْراً وَلَا تُخَلِّفُوا كُلًّا فَيَكُونَ عَلَيْكُمْ كَلًّا
enWisdom: Verily when a man dies people say: ‘What has he left behind?’ while the angels say: ‘What has he sent forward?’ Your forefathers are for Allah! Send some of your wealth forward, so that it may be a provision for you [in the Hereafter], and do not leave all of it behind such that it becomes a [heavy] burden on you

Wisdom: إِذَا كَانَ هُجُومُ الْمَوْتِ لَا يُؤْمَنُ فَمِنَ الْعَجْزِ تَرْكُ التَّأَهُّبِ لَهُ
enWisdom: When one cannot remain secure from the onslaught of death, then not being prepared for it is incompetence

Wisdom: تَارِكُ التَّأَهُّبِ لِلْمَوْتِ وَاغْتِنَامِ الْمَهَلِ غَافِلٌ عَنْ هُجُومِ الْأَجَلِ
enWisdom: The one who does not prepare for death and take benefit of respite is negligent of the onslaught of death

Wisdom: تَرَحَّلُوا فَقَدْ جَدَّ بِكُمْ وَاسْتَعِدُّوا لِلْمَوْتِ فَقَدْ أَظَلَّكُمْ
enWisdom: Begin your journey for you have been pushed forward and prepare for death for it has overshadowed you

Wisdom: سَابِقُوا الْأَجَلَ وَأَحْسِنُوا الْعَمَلَ تَسْعَدُوا بِالْمَهَلِ
enWisdom: Anticipate death and do good deeds; [by this] you will attain felicity through your [hastening to good deeds while you have] respite

Wisdom: عَجِبْتُ لِمَنْ يَرَى أَنَّهُ يَنْقُصُ كُلُّ يَوْمٍ فِي نَفْسِهِ وَعُمُرِهِ وَهُوَ لَا يَتَأَهَّبُ لِلْمَوْتِ
enWisdom: I am amazed at the person who sees his body and his lifespan decreasing every day and still does not make preparations for death

Wisdom: عَجِبْتُ لِمَنْ خَافَ الْبَيَاتَ فَلَمْ يَكُفَّ
enWisdom: I am amazed at the one who fears the ambush [of death] and still does not desist

Wisdom: غَائِبُ الْمَوْتِ أَحَقُّ مُنْتَظَرٍ وَأَقْرَبُ قَادِمٍ
enWisdom: The absent death is more deserving of being awaited and is closer in its approach [than any other traveller whose return is expected]

Wisdom: فَالْأَرْوَاحُ مُرْتَهَنَةٌ بِثِقْلِ أَعْبَائِهَا [بثقيل أعيابها] مُوقِنَةٌ بِغَيْبِ أَنْبَائِهَا لَا تُسْتَزَادُ مِنْ صَالِحِ عَمَلِهَا وَلَا تُسْتَعْتَبُ [لَا تَعْتَبُ‏] مِنْ سَيِّئِ زَلَلِهَا
enWisdom: [In the Hereafter] the souls are held at ransom by the weight of their sins and have become certain of their unseen fatesNeither can good acts be added [to their record] nor are they given warning about their evil deeds [rather, the harsh punishment of hell awaits them]

Wisdom: رَحِمَ اللَّهُ امْرَأً بَادَرَ الْأَجَلَ وَأَكْذَبَ الْأَمَلَ وَأَخْلَصَ الْعَمَلَ
enWisdom: May Allah have mercy upon the person who anticipates death and performs good deeds for the abode of his [permanent] residence and the place of his dignity
